string.text: Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 5 rounds of 7.62x51 caliber ammo.
Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 10 rounds of 7.62x51 caliber ammo.
Rechambered magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems with a capacity of 5 rounds of 7.62x39 caliber ammo.
Rechambered magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems with a capacity of 10 rounds of 7.62x39 caliber ammo.
Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 5 rounds of 7.62x54 caliber ammo.
Magazine for VPO-101 and compatible systems, manufactured by Molot arms with a capacity of 10 rounds of 7.62x54 caliber ammo.
